description: This source file defines a local implementation of the __stack_chk_fail_local function, which calls the externally declared __stack_chk_fail function to handle stack check failures in the program. It includes function attributes for noreturn and visibility.

methods.name: void __stack_chk_fail_local(void)
methods.description: A function marked as noreturn and hidden visibility that invokes __stack_chk_fail in case of a stack check failure.
